channel.title: Beyond Fake Studying
channel.description: Learn how to trigger genuine curiosity so studying stops feeling like a grind and starts feeling like cheating.

item.title: Study Procrastination Isn't a Discipline Problem
item.description: You know you should start studying. The exam is in three days. And yet here you are, reorganizing your desk. The standard advice? Just use willpower. This advice almost never works.
